      • findConstructor

        protected java.lang.reflect.Constructor<E> findConstructor()
        Obtains the constructor for the passed entity class.

        The entity class must have a constructor with the single parameter of type defined by generic type <I>.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the entity class does not have the required constructor
